contract.description:
Swap pool contract. May or may not be covered by a backstop pool. Conceptionally, there are two ways to temporarily disable a pool:
The owner can either pause the pool, disabling deposits, swaps & backstop,
or the owner can set the pool cap to zero which only prevents deposits.
The former is for security incidents, the latter for phasing out a pool.
contract.name: SwapPool

docs:
Swap pool contract. May or may not be covered by a backstop pool. Conceptionally, there are two ways to temporarily disable a pool:
The owner can either pause the pool, disabling deposits, swaps & backstop,
or the owner can set the pool cap to zero which only prevents deposits.
The former is for security incidents, the latter for phasing out a pool.
emitted on every deposit
events.label: Mint

docs: emitted on every withdrawal special case withdrawal using backstop liquidiity: amountPrincipleWithdrawn = 0
events.label: Burn

docs: emitted when a backstop pool LP withdraws liquidity from swap pool only possible if swap pool coverage ratio remains >= 100%
events.label: BackstopDrain

docs: Tracks the exact amounts of individual fees paid during a swap
events.label: ChargedSwapFees

docs: Returns the pooled token's address
messages.label: asset

docs: Returns the worth of an amount of pool shares (LP tokens) in underlying principle
messages.label: sharesTargetWorth

docs: Deposits amount of tokens into pool Will change cov ratio of pool, will increase delta to 0
messages.label: deposit

docs: Set new insurance withdrawal time lock. Can only be called by the owner
messages.label: setInsuranceWithdrawalTimelock

docs: Set new upper limit of pool reserves. Will disable deposits when reached. Can always set to an amount < current reserves to temporarily restrict deposits.
messages.label: setPoolCap

docs: Set swap fees (applied when swapping funds out of the pool)
messages.label: setSwapFees

docs: Withdraws liquidity amount of asset ensuring minimum amount required
messages.label: withdraw

docs: Burns LP tokens of owner, will get compensated using backstop liquidity Can only be invoked by backstop pool, disabled when pool is paused
messages.label: backstopBurn

docs: For backstop pool to withdraw liquidity if swap pool's coverage ratio > 100% Can only be invoked by backstop pool
messages.label: backstopDrain

docs: Get called by Router to deposit an amount of pool asset Can only be called by Router
messages.label: swapIntoFromRouter

docs: get called by Router to withdraw amount of pool asset Can only be called by Router
messages.label: swapOutFromRouter

docs: Pause deposits and swaps
messages.label: pause

docs: Resume deposits and swaps
messages.label: unpause

docs: returns pool coverage ratio
messages.label: coverage

docs: Return the earliest block no that insurance withdrawals are possible.
messages.label: insuranceWithdrawalUnlock

docs: Get a quote for the effective amount of tokens, incl. slippage and fees
messages.label: quoteSwapInto

docs: Get a quote for the effective amount of tokens, incl. slippage and fees
messages.label: quoteSwapOut

docs: Return the configured swap fees for this pool
messages.label: swapFees
